entries.content: Objections are not rejections but information requests to disqualify unqualified prospects early.
entries.notes: Emphasizes proactive disqualification to avoid wasted time.

entries.content: State potential objections upfront to quickly identify if the prospect can proceed or not.
entries.notes: Forces early clarity by addressing barriers head-on.

entries.content: Can I tell you the three reasons why we're probably not going to work together?
entries.notes: Directly invites objections as a qualification tool.

entries.content: Closing is about securing a clear decision (yes/no), not just pushing for a sale.
entries.notes: Reframes closing as mutual commitment rather than persuasion.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
